verses.roman:
madya-bhāṇḍa-pāśe dhari' nija-ghare gela
prātaḥ-kāle śrīvāsa tāhā ta' dekhila

synonyms: madya-bhāṇḍa—a pot of wine; pāśe—by the side of; dhari'-placing; nija-ghare—to his own home; gela—went; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; tāhā—all those things; ta'-certainly; dekhila—saw.
translation: He placed a pot of wine beside all this, and in the morning when Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura opened his door he saw this paraphernalia.
